title: Defensive Driving - Essential Principles & Practices
headline: In this free online course, learn the essential driving skills and practices for making your daily commute safer.
description: Despite dire conditions or other people's faults, defensive driving is the practice of anticipating risky scenarios. We have designed this course for people willing to learn basic defensive driving techniques. It includes aspects of being alert while driving and compares the attributes of defensive and aggressive drivers. Study how to drive in dangerous climatic situations and learn the intoxicating drugs that impair a driver's ability.
courseDescription:
Road Traffic Accidents (RTAs) are one of the major causes of human morbidity and mortality. Every day, thousands of people around the globe suffer from traffic-related accidents. These incidents threaten human lives and cause major property and economic damage. Healthcare systems and facilities worldwide have become overburdened due to mass disasters involving automobiles. These accidents occur because of the lack of proper traffic education and awareness. Usually, inexperienced and naïve drivers go on the road without contemplating the seriousness of their actions and the danger they pose to themselves, those around them and property in general. The other reasons these incidents happen include weather, drugs and the condition of the vehicles involved in the accident. The consultants at Exoexcellence and Alison collaborated and developed this easy-to-understand, concise, comprehensive and complete course on defensive driving. It highlights the important considerations for anyone who wants to become a vigilant driver, starting from fundamental and essential concepts.

What is the benefit you can expect from this course? First, learn the tips, tricks and methods of practical defensive driving, especially in this hectic day and age where everyone seems to be in a hurry. We aim to educate all those who commute to work or educational institutes every day. Become an effective and responsible driver who cares for their safety and those around you. There are three modules in total. The first module discusses various causes of road traffic incidents, types of drivers on the road and some physical and mental conditions that make driving dangerous. The second module is dedicated to situations you could find yourself in and the strategies to extricate yourself from these occurrences. Finally, the third module allows you to prepare for some common car emergencies and explains how to react in these circumstances.

This engaging course provides various statistics regarding the death toll, types and causes of road traffic accidents. These statistics are helpful as they present a deeper insight into the causes of road traffic accidents. In addition, we include three case studies intended to provide you with real-world glimpses regarding this subject. The material of this course discusses different physical and mental conditions often overlooked, although they are the primary causative agents of road-traffic accidents. Once you complete all the topics, you will have the opportunity to test your knowledge by taking a brief assessment, making you eligible to apply for the Alison certificate. So wait no more and become a better driver and citizen who values safety and life through this course on defensive driving.
